original_text: And Pharaoh rose up in the night, he and all his servants and all the Egyptians. And there was a great cry in Egypt, for there was not a house where someone was not dead.
korean_text: 그 밤에 바로와 그 모든 신하와 모든 애굽 사람이 일어나고 애굽에 큰 부르짖음이 있었으니 이는 그 나라에 죽임을 당하지 아니한 집이 하나도 없었음이었더라

sentences.original_text: And Pharaoh rose up in the night
he and all his servants and all the Egyptians
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 모든 신하들과 모든 애굽 사람들이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And there was a great cry in Egypt
for there was not a house where someone was not dead
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 죽은 자가 없는 집이 하나도 없었기 때문입니다.
